We deliver optimized solutions for safety and efficiency, combining advanced technology with extensive expertise.
Committed to transparency, reliability, and respect for the marine environment, we drive sustainable growth.
whyWheelhouse.imageAlt2: Wheelhouse service engineer inspecting the radar antenna on board
whyWheelhouse.imageAlt3: Wheelhouse service engineer inspecting the equipment on bridge
whyWheelhouse.whyIntro: Our commitment to offering advanced, continuous support and services, together with our firm belief in ethical business practices, makes Wheelhouse a trusted long-term partner.
whyWheelhouse.item1Desc: Always putting Reliability first, with the motto "Customers trust helps Wheelhouse affirm the brand".
whyWheelhouse.item2Desc: Serving customers whole-heartedly with the mission "Serving customers well is serving our own future".
whyWheelhouse.item3Desc: Wheelhouse is committed to providing customers with the best quality products and services.
whyWheelhouse.item4Desc: With our experience, knowledge and acumen in handling situations, our human resources always strive to bring practical benefits to customers.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.beforeHighlights: At Wheelhouse, we provide solutions and services to make your vessel operate more safely.
whatWeDo.afterHighlights: Let us be your trusted companion on your journey.
whatWeDo.highlight1Desc: Advanced navigation monitoring and optimization solutions for maximum operational efficiency
whatWeDo.highlight2Desc: Cutting-edge satellite communication systems ensuring seamless connectivity at sea
whatWeDo.highlight3Desc: Reliable maritime communication systems keeping your fleet connected worldwide
whatWeDo.highlight4Desc: Expert guidance and installation services for optimal maritime system performance
whatWeDo.highlight5Desc: Thorough annual inspections and assessments to maintain compliance and safety standards
